name: DialogRoot
description:
Groups all parts of the dialog.
Doesnâ€™t render its own HTML element.

defaultOpen.description:
Whether the dialog is initially open.
To render a controlled dialog, use the `open` prop instead.

dismissible.description: Determines whether the dialog should close when clicking outside of it.

modal.description: Determines whether the dialog is modal.

onOpenChange.description: Callback invoked when the dialog is being opened or closed.

open.description: Determines whether the dialog is open.
